alert.note: Alert for Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued December 13 at 6:05PM EST until December 14 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Upper and Middle Florida Keys. * WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Wednesday, and possibly into Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
